籤詩版本二:
Kumhanya-mhanya, kuvhara njodzi dzakawanda, kutakura mvura uye kukweva vanhu kuti vakwire makomo
Ndinototarira kune imwe nyika kuti ndibatsirwe.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakafanana nekukweva madhaka nemvura.
Kuchengeta zvinhu zvekare kunounza rombo rakanaka.
解曰: Kudzokera kunogoneka. Kufambira mberi kwakaoma. Ingo chengetedza. Usatarisira kukwira kumusoro.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Zvakaoma kuti Qiuniang aende
Du Qiu aive chizvarwa cheJinling muTang Dynasty.
Pazera ramakore gumi nemashanu, akava murongo waLi Qi (mutengesi muTang Dynasty).
Mugore rechipiri reYuanhe (807), Li Qi akatanga zviri pamutemo uto rekupandukira. Gare gare, kupandukira kwaLi Qi kwakakundikana uye Du Qiu akaverengerwa mumuzinda. Gare gare, akafarirwa naMambo Xianzong weTang Dynasty uye akava murongo.
Mugore regumi neshanu raYuanhe (820), Tang Muzong akauya pachigaro ndokumugadza semwanakomana wake Li Min's Fumu (nanny ainyanya kutarisira vana vemhuri yehumambo).
Gare gare, Li Min akabviswa pachigaro saMambo weZhang, uye Du Qiuci akadzokera kumusha kwake.
Du Mu paakapfuura naJinling, akamuona ari murombo uye akura ...
(Nyaya iyi idimikira rekudemba kuti zvinhu zvinotonyanya kuipa nguva dzese.)
聖意: Musha hauzvinakire, kunamatira pfuma, rombo rakanaka mumatsutso nechando, kuroora kwakanaka, kunamatira makomborero Liujia, kunamatira makomborero kune vanofamba netsoka, kuvharira minda, makonye esirika, kusafarira zvipfuwo zvitanhatu, kunetsa kuwana vanhu, kumatare edzimhosva, kurasikirwa nerombo rakanaka, kurasikirwa nepfuma, kurwara, uye rombo rakanaka remakuva emakomo.
